changelog: Added save buttons to each configuration section (Sonarr, Radarr, Email, Schedule)
Replaced emoji icons with real Sonarr and Radarr logos
Fixed duplicate newsletter sends with lock file mechanism (1-hour protection)
Fixed timer configuration: AccuracySec=1s and Persistent=false to prevent multiple triggers
Fixed SMTP test to use STARTTLS encryption properly
Restored original beautiful email template design
All previous v1.0.8 improvements still included
